name: Alienation (itch) (Maureen "Momo" Wang)
description:
Alienation is a short, 10-minute-long 2D narrative-based combat platformer. Play as an explorer whose spaceship has crashed in the middle of an alien ritual.

MAIN MENU NAVIGATION: mouse + click
MOVEMENT: WASD / arrow keys
MAGIC / INTERACT: E / enter

ART/DIALOGUE: Maureen "Momo" Wang (twitter)
PROGRAMMING: Purusharth Tomar
MUSIC: Krystof Senfeld (soundcloud)

Special thanks to Alex Zhang for some of the dialogue.

Ran into an issue? Please email maurwang@gmail.com and ptomar@usc.edu for the quickest response. 
This short game was made back in 2017 for a class, and while we are aware of many of the ways in which the game could be improved, we do not anticipate revisiting it in the near future.  Feedback is still welcome - feel free to comment.
